imdb.plot outline: Each episode of "ETC: Employment Through Craigslist" is based on an actual job posting from the "ETC" section of job postings on Craigslist. Richie and Matt are roommates who are faced with the reality of crippling gambling debt. In order to pay off their bookie, Matt and Richie search the ETC section of Craigslist for jobs that can make them money quickly. The first season follows Matt and Richie as they perform the following jobs: sperm donors, focus group participants, hair stylist guinea pigs, limo dispatchers, and gay models. The season culminates when they finally meet their bookie and pay him their first installment.
imdb.title: ETC: Employment Through Craigslist
plot: Each episode of "_ETC: Employment Through Craigslist_ (qv)" is based on an actual job posting from the "ETC" section of job postings on Craigslist. Richie and Matt are roommates who are faced with the reality of crippling gambling debt. In order to pay off their bookie, Matt and Richie search the ETC section of Craigslist for jobs that can make them money quickly. The first season follows Matt and Richie as they perform the following jobs: sperm donors, focus group participants, hair stylist guinea pigs, limo dispatchers, and gay models. The season culminates when they finally meet their bookie and pay him their first installment.::Richie Moriarty and Matt Catanzano
